title: It's Always Been You
description: A Romance Cafe CollectionTake the plunge in this summer’s most anticipated Friends to Lovers collection for charity!This spicy bites set has it all:✓ sizzling romance✓ hot heroes✓ feisty heroines✓ HEA guaranteedOver thirty titillating stories from USA Today best-selling and award-winning romance authors in a spicy Friends to Lovers collection curated by The New Romance Cafe, with ALL proceeds going to the Breast Cancer Research Foundation.Authors: Sofia Aves, Kristine Charles, DL Gallie, Ariel Dawn, Amy Stephens, K. Rose, Guinevere Jordan, Kamaria Sweet, Enid Ashton, J.F. Lowe, Melanie Greene, Rhiannon Marina, Sarah Stein, J.M. Adele, Tirza Schaefer, Bonnie Poirier, Katy Rose, Angelica Kate, Chelle Pimblott, Katie Frey, Jewelz Baxter, Chele MacCabe, Leila Coltyn, Serafina Jax, Tara Lee, Harper Michaels, Pandora Snow, Kimberly Gray, S.C. Principale, Jane Poller, Anna Klein, Claudia Shelton, Toni Lee, Trinity Wood, J K Lycke, Rebecca Conrad, Adelyn Zara
author: Trinity Wood
